00021 #define SQR(x)  ((x)*(x))
00022 #define CBE(x)  ((x)*(x)*(x))
00023 #define QRT(x)  ((x)*(x)*(x)*(x))
00024 
00025 complex double Y(int l, int m, double theta, double phi)
00026 {
00027   switch (l) {
00028   case 0 :
00029     return (0.5/sqrt(M_PI));
00030   case 2 :
00031     switch (m) {
00032     case +2 :
00033       return (-0.5*cexp(I*phi)*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*sin(theta));
00034     case 0 :
00035       return (0.5*sqrt(3.0/M_PI)*cos(theta));
00036     case -2 :
00037       return (0.5*cexp(-I*phi)*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*sin(theta));
00038     }
00039   case 4 :
00040     switch (m) {
00041     case +4 :
00042       return (0.25*cexp(2*I*phi)*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00043     case +2 :
00044       return (-0.5*cexp(I*phi)*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*cos(theta)*sin(theta));
00045     case 0 :
00046       return (0.25*sqrt(5/M_PI)*(3*SQR(cos(theta))-1));
00047     case -2 :
00048       return (0.5*cexp(-I*phi)*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*cos(theta)*sin(theta));
00049     case -4 :
00050       return (0.25*cexp(-2*I*phi)*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00051     }
00052   case 6 :
00053     switch (m) {
00054     case +6 :
00055       return (-0.125*cexp(3*I*phi)*sqrt(35/M_PI)*CBE(sin(theta)));
00056     case +4 :
00057       return (0.25*cexp(2*I*phi)*sqrt(52.5/M_PI)*cos(theta)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00058     case +2 :
00059       return (-0.125*cexp(I*phi)*sqrt(21/M_PI)*(5*SQR(cos(theta))-1)*sin(theta));
00060     case 0 :
00061       return (0.25*sqrt(7/M_PI)*(5*CBE(cos(theta))-3*cos(theta)));
00062     case -2 :
00063       return (0.125*cexp(-I*phi)*sqrt(21/M_PI)*(5*SQR(cos(theta))-1)*sin(theta));
00064     case -4 :
00065       return (0.25*cexp(-2*I*phi)*sqrt(52.5/M_PI)*cos(theta)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00066     case -6 :
00067       return (0.125*cexp(-3*I*phi)*sqrt(35/M_PI)*CBE(sin(theta)));
00068     }
00069   case 8 :
00070     switch (m) {
00071     case +8 :
00072       return (0.1875*cexp(4*I*phi)*sqrt(17.5/M_PI)*QRT(sin(theta)));
00073     case +6 :
00074       return (-0.375*cexp(3*I*phi)*sqrt(35/M_PI)*cos(theta)*CBE(sin(theta)));
00075     case +4 :
00076       return (0.375*cexp(2*I*phi)*sqrt(2.5/M_PI)*(7*SQR(cos(theta))-1)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00077     case +2 :
00078       return (-0.375*cexp(I*phi)*sqrt(5/M_PI)*(7*SQR(cos(theta))-3)*cos(theta)*sin(theta));
00079     case 0 :
00080       return (0.1875/sqrt(M_PI)*(35*QRT(cos(theta))-30*SQR(cos(theta))+3));
00081     case -2 :
00082       return (0.375*cexp(-I*phi)*sqrt(5/M_PI)*(7*SQR(cos(theta))-3)*cos(theta)*sin(theta));
00083     case -4 :
00084       return (0.375*cexp(-2*I*phi)*sqrt(2.5/M_PI)*(7*SQR(cos(theta))-1)*SQR(sin(theta)));
00085     case -6 :
00086       return (0.375*cexp(-3*I*phi)*sqrt(35/M_PI)*cos(theta)*CBE(sin(theta)));
00087     case -8 :
00088       return (0.1875*cexp(-4*I*phi)*sqrt(17.5/M_PI)*QRT(sin(theta)));
00089     }
00090   default:
00091     fprintf(stderr, "sphericalharmonics.c: Y(l,m,theta,phi) not implemented for l>8\n");
00092     exit(-1);
00093   }
00094 }
